products.name: Cap & Gown Set
products.description: Tassel included; ships until 10 days before the event. Sizes available at pickup; exchange allowed on-site if inventory permits.

products.name: Parking Pass
products.description: One vehicle per pass. Multiple passes are allowed per student for extended family or guests.

parking_rules: Vehicles parked in handicap spaces will be towed.

q: Can I buy multiple parking passes?
faq.a: Yes, multiple parking passes are allowed per student.

q: What time do the parking lots open?
faq.a: Parking lots open 2 hours before the ceremony.
Formal attire is recommended but not required. No muscle shirts or sagging pants.

q: Where do I pick up the gown?
faq.a: Pickup is at the Student Center Bookstore during the week prior to the event.
Shipping is available until 10 days before the event. Typical shipping takes 3–5 business days.
